review: Easy to set up.  The hardest part is going to the internet gateway and finding the wireless access password.Portable.  I went to my in-laws yesterday.  They don't have a lot of channels for kids.  We were going to be there for a few hours and the kids have always gotten "bored!" in the past despite our best efforts to keep them entertained.  Who wants to pull out toy after toy and hear the complaining while we're talking and eating dinner and playing cards? So I took Apple TV with us.  The cables (two of them) and the box fit in a grocery bag.  I hooked it up to my in-laws TV and the kids watched cartoons and their junk while the grown ups did our thing.  After dinner I went on YouTube and played songs for my 75 year old father in-law that he hadn't heard in years, that he loved, etc. etc.  He loved it! Then we watched clips of sporting events on YouTube.  He loved them.Portable is a HUGE pro for this product.  Other products like the Roku will be portable as well but this is so easy to set up, so easy to use (my six year old can easily navigate the interface), and just so...great!Be advised that you'll need a HDMI cable.  We bought an Amazon brand 6.5 foot cable for about $6 at the same time as when we bought this Apple TV and I had it hooked up in under five minutes.  Love it.  Chef recommends!

review: I generally LOVE Apple products. I HATE this piece of junk. I'd call it worse than that but this IS a public forum. If I want to listen to my itunes on this, I can. Yeah, but I don't, because my music sounds much better on my Bose iDock than it does on my TV speakers.  If I want to watch youtube on this, I can, no problem. But what I really wanted it for was to watch netflix and to interface with my MacBook Pro. OF COURSE, these are the two things it WILL NOT DO!I can't even open Netflix most of the time. Or it is slow. Or stops and starts.When I use airplay, so that I can use the TV as a big screen for my computer, it packs up on me and just quits doing it. Airplay. Should call it Airpoop. Cuz it Airpoops out on me all the time!I returned the first Apple TV I had as defective, because even Apple support couldn't help me fix it. Now with the second one I am just giving up.  This is a shameful product. SHAME SHAME SHAME on you Apple! You charge a lot of money for your products and I LOVE my MacBook Pro and my iPhone, but this is a MASSIVE FAIL!I wouldn't be so mad about this if my expectations weren't so high. This is an APPLE product! It should be awesome! IT'S NOT!I'm going to go buy a Roku. Airpoop on you, Apple!
